English: Soviet base
Comment:
On load mission
STRM_ONLOAD_INTRO,Later that day
column7:
On load intro

STRM_15v01,What the fuck were you thinking?"

English: Are you fucking mental or just plain stupid?
It was an opoortunity and I took it, Lemontov!
Opportunity for what? You had barely enough men to hold that territory let alone take it!
I... I may have undertaken a small risk, but victory gould give us ...
Nothing! We would just have to defend more territory with fewer men!
The offensive war partial success as the enemy suffered losses...
You took out few of their light tanks and one base. Excellent job.
Don't ridicule me, Lemontov! As if you would have done any better!
I told you, Zubarev, that we have to be on the defensive.\nWe are outnumbered and have to lure the enemy to narrow passes and rough terrain, that is our advantage!
The great Russian bear does not sit idle in the hills while the enemy surrounds him!\nOur attack today delayed them and made them change their plans! They will have to rebuild...
No, you lost us central Kolguyev today, that's what you did you fucking moron!
Comrades, please. The whole camp can hear you arguing. It's not good for the morale.

I'm done talking anyway. You know Lemontov, I am not sure why Volkov even allowed you back in the army.\nYou lack vision ever since Livanoch's death and that prison time hasn't done you any good.\nOnce Volkov arrives I'll personally request you to be stripped of your rank and sent back to Russia, in chains preferrably.
Pompous prick. I hate that asshole. Why is he in command here again?
Because he's Volkov aide and supports everything he says before the Kreml? Also married to his daughter I believe?
It's certainly not his military genius.
You shouldn't have been so rough with him. He is powerful outside of battlefield and can make your life hell.

I'm too old to be bothered by political shit, Stas. Whatever he and Volkov might have in store for me was already decided.\nI'm running on a borrowed time here and I can't waste it sugar-coating my words with that shitface.
Huh, what the hell do we do with this mess? The next enemy offensive might push up to this base before I can stop it.
We're gonna have to improvise, Grigory. Let's recon a bit, see what they're planning. Then we can make a counter move.
The last offensive didn't go so well I've been told. You hear anything, Sergei?
I've seen the plan and the reports. The assault was too ambitious and risky and the tanks were not given enough support.\nWe can be glad we didn't lose more.
But what do we do now? We're holding less than half the island now. Are the reinforcements coming, comrade captain?
I am not at liberty to comment on that, comrade.
We'll know when they arrive, Vadim. For now we can only fight on. Heads up, we're entering enemy territory.
You're starting to sound more and more like a commander, you know that Rashiv?
I learned from the best, captain.
Holy shit, that is a lot of tanks. We can't hope to hold this!
LEONID TO DMITRI, SQUDAS ON BOARD, HEADING OUT. ESTIMATED TIME OF ARRIVAL: TWO MINUTES. OUT.
ROMAN TO DMITRI, WE'RE HEADING NORTH ACCORDING TO PLAN. SEE YOU THERE, OVER.
KONSTANTIN TO DMITRI, HEADING SOUTH. FIRST STOP: SOUTHERN BASE. OVER.
I HEAR YOU RECON SQUADS. EVERYTHING IS CLEAR BACK HERE, NOT TOO MUCH TRAFFIC BUT THE ENEMY HAS BUILT SEVERAL SMALL FORWARD CAMPS IN THE HILLS. EXPECT ENEMY CONTANT SOON. OUT.
KONSTANTIN TO DMITRI, BASE TORTOISE REPORT. FEW LIGHT TANKS, BUT MAINLY INFANTRY. SEVERAL SQUADS. THE ENEMY IS ENTRENCHED HERE WELL, FORMIDABLE FORTIFICATIONS. OVER.
UNDERSTOOD KONSTANTIN. CONTINUE TO THE HILLS. OUT.
ROMAN TO DMITRI, WE'VE TRAVERSED THE HILLS AND ARE ENTERING THE FORESTS AROUND BASE DEER. OUT.
RASHIV, YOU ARE OUR DEISGNATED SPOTTER. GO AND SCOUT THE BASE. WE'LL HOLD HERE.
ROMAN 9 TO DMITRI. BASE DEER REPORT. THE ENEMY HAS A LARGE AMOUNT OF TANKS STATIONED HERE. LIGHT TANKS, APCS, HEAVY ARMOUR, EVERYTHING. OVER.
UNDRESTOOD. THIS IS A GOLD MINE, A VITAL PIECE OF INFORMATION. GOOD JOB, ROMAN 9, RETURN TO YOUR SQUAD AND GET BACK TO LEONID. OUT.
DMITRI TO KONSTANTIN, RETURN TO LEONID, MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. RETREAT TO OUR BASE. OUT.
DMITRI TO ALL UNITS, BEWARE. A LARGE CONVOY OF TRUCKS AND TANKS HAS PASSED BASE TORTOISE. THE'RE HEADING FURTHER NORTH. LEONID, GET THE HELL OUT OF THERE!
WE CAN SEE THEM DMITRI. THE'RE IN PURSUIT, WE'LL NEED TO RETREAT BACK TO BASE. SORRY BOYS!
ROMAN AND KONSTANTIN, YOU'LL HAVE TO GET TO BASE ON FOOT. BEWARE, THE ENEMY IS LOOKING FOR YOU, GIVE THE ROAD A WIDE BERTH. OUT.
I FOUND A SNIPER RIFLE, CAPTAIN! IT MIGHT COME IN HANDY!
Base Tortoise
Base Deer
Road
Retreat to Base
Konstantin
Roman
Spetsnaz
Scout the Hills
